name: Space Wizards
description: Space Wizards is a local multiplayer top-down twin stick shooter where you and your friends play as  powerful wizards who are immune to damage and are pitted against each other in a variety of deadly arenas IN SPACE. How do you win? Well, just because you are invincible doesn't mean the kinetic force of spells won't affect you. With the many spells at your disposal, push your enemies off the edge of the map, make them run around uncontrollably, or knock them into the many deadly hazards that populate the arena.
